Foot protection gear: Use specialized foot protection gears like boots or sandals with thick soles.
Foot covers and pads: Cover your feet with protective covers or pads made from durable fabrics such as rubber or silicone.
Cushioned socks: Wear extra thick and cushioned socks that can protect your feet while also providing warmth and insulation.
Adjustable straps: Construct shoes using adjustable straps to provide support and stability to your feet as you walk.
Shoe cushions: Create cushions specifically designed to fit inside shoes to help prevent slipping and protect your feet from pain and discomfort.
